鏙鏙鏙

鏙字的基本解释

鏙
cuī
〔鏙错（
cu?）〕（鱼鳞）错杂的样子，如“鳞甲鏙鏙，焕烂锦斑。”

鏙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cuī］
［《玉篇》七回切］
［《廣韻》七罪切，上賄，清。］
(1)间杂貌。参见“鏙錯”。
(2)金属制品散裂。参见“鏙然”。
(3)烧茶温酒的器具。

鏙字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鏙； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1320第01
【玉篇】七回切，音摧。鏙錯也。【集韻】一曰文采貌。【郭璞·江賦】鱗甲鏙錯。　又【廣韻】七罪切【集韻】取猥切，?音漼。義同。

鏙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鏙字的起名意思

暂无。

鏙
Basic explanation of words
鏙
cuī
〔鏙菙菙(
cu?)] (fish scales) intricate appearance, such as "scaly armor, bright brocade spots."
鏙
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [cuī]
[Seven back cuts of "Jade Pian"]
["Guangyun" seven crimes are cut, bribery, clear. ]
(1) Mixed appearance. See "Cross".
(2) Spallation of metal products. See "Yuan Ran".
(3) Apparatus for making tea and warming wine.
鏙
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鏙; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1320 01
[Jade articles] Seven back cuts, the sound is destroyed. It's wrong. [Jiyun] One is the appearance of literary grace. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] The scales are wrong.　 [Guang Yun] Seven Sins Cut [Ji Yun] Take the inferior cut,? Sound. The same meaning.
